category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 13-2 (Organization and operation of member sport organizations)
contents: Article 13-2 (Organization and operation of member sports organizations) ① The Sports Association respects the Olympic Charter and the regulations of the International Federation of Sports and Sports Associations and, except for those stipulated in the Articles of Incorporation and related regulations, shall exercise autonomy of member sports organizations for transparent operation of member sports organizations. Operation must be guaranteed., ② Member sports organizations are organized into city/provincial sports organizations, and a national federation may be established if necessary., ③ The president of a member sports organization is elected through an election in accordance with the articles of incorporation of the relevant organization. do. Revised on July 5, 2021, ④ The organization and operation of member sports organizations shall be determined separately. [Moved from Article 38 on July 5, 2021]
